title: FSA Student Aid Estimator - User Data
description: User data required to execute the FSA Student Aid Estimator wizard

state_of_residence.description: Student's state of legal residence (full state name, e.g., 'Illinois')

grade_level.description: Student's grade level for the 2026-27 school year

has_dependents.description: Does the student have children or other dependents that they support?

personal_circumstances.description: Student's personal circumstances (select all that apply or 'none')

parent_state_of_residence.description: Parent's state of legal residence (full state name, e.g., 'Illinois')

family_size.description: Number of people in the student's family, including the student

parent_filed_taxes.description: Did the student's parent file taxes in 2024?

parent_income.description: Parent's adjusted gross income in dollars (required if parent_filed_taxes = yes)

parent_assets.description: Parent's total assets in dollars (required if parent_filed_taxes = yes)

parent_child_support.description: Annual child support received in dollars (optional, enter 0 if none)

student_filed_taxes.description: Did the student file taxes in 2024?
